move_details.name: miracle-eye
move_details.effect_description: Resets the target’s evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field.  A dark Pokémon under this effect takes normal damage from psychic moves.  This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
move_details.flavor_text: Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by Psychic-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.
